page.title: 10LOCHALSH GIRL GUIDES
page.content: As this is is the 75th birthday of the Girl Guide Association there are many celebrations.One of the major ones is the passing of a lighted candle round the whole world.Princess Margaret the president of the Guides lit the first one and the Scottish Chief Commissioner is going round Scotland and on the 25th day of June she was in Inverness.The Guides left Kyle at 10am and spent the day first at the swimming pool and then the fire station where an emergency arose when they were there.In the evening they went to a park where there were over 2000 guides.They marched past with their flags and had a campfire sing song before passing round lighted candles.They set off for home arriving back at 22.30.
